modName: Hitmarker Sneak and Crit Sound Replacer
summary: Replaces Skyrim's sneak and crit sound with that of a slightly more subtle hitmarker sound.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]What does this mod do?[/size]

Hitmarker Sneak and Crit sound replacer simply replaces the ui_sneakattack_01.wav file with that of a hitmarker sound, and is also slightly tuned down in volume.

Want to preview what the sneak attack sound is like? Click here: [url=http://puu.sh/6WrHB.wav]http://puu.sh/6WrHB.wav[/url]

The ui_sneakattack_01.wave file triggers when the player character lands a sneak attack or critical attack.

[size=5]Installation[/size]
Simply download with NMM or MO and install like any other mod. Manual install is extract to your /skyrim/ folder.

[size=5]Compatibility with other sound mods[/size]
Since this mod is just a super simple loose file (.wav), just install it with NMM or MO. The only file added by this mod is ui_sneakattack_01.wav, which is in the skyrim/data/sound/fx/ui/ folder.[b] No .esp.[/b]
author: insane0hflex
